metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0492 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - untriaged.
metadata.Description:
Johnathan Nightingale beep through 1.3.4, if setuid, has a race condition that allows local privilege escalation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0492` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

beep - 1.3-4+deb9u1~build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: beep package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3-4+deb9u1~build0.16.04.1').
